about_the_game:
Step into a surreal and haunting world in "The Night of the Inquisitor" demo, where you take on the role of a trapped Priest pursued by an enigmatic Inquisitor.

This demo serves as a Prologue for The Night of the Inquisitor.
detailed_description:
Step into a surreal and haunting world in "The Night of the Inquisitor" demo, where you take on the role of a trapped Priest pursued by an enigmatic Inquisitor.

This demo serves as a Prologue for The Night of the Inquisitor.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: 2.4GHZ Dual Core Processor Or Higher
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB VRAM Or Greater with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities

name: The Night Of The Inquisitor Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: x86 32 bit
  • Graphics: 512MB VRAM Or Greater with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Step into a surreal and haunting world in "The Night of the Inquisitor" demo, where you take on the role of a trapped Priest pursued by an enigmatic Inquisitor. This demo serves as a Prologue for The Night of the Inquisitor.
